item.title: Delta Air Lines has pulled back to attractive levels. Trading the carrier with options
item.description: Tony Zhang tells CNBC Pro readers how he's trading DAL through options.

item.title: BlackRock says investors can no longer rely on bonds for portfolio safety
item.description: BlackRock said the volatility in bond markets underscores a structural shift driven by heavier government borrowing and a "higher-for-longer" rate env...

item.title: UBS lifts Texas Instruments price target, says free cash flow is at inflection point
item.description: UBS sees shares of Texas Instruments rallying another 32% from here.

item.title: Oppenheimer names Amazon a top mega-cap pick on AI-driven Web Services growth
item.description: Oppenheimer's revised price target implies that shares of Amazon could surge another 29% from here.

item.title: Morgan Stanley upgrades Johnson & Johnson, sees upside on robust drug pipeline
item.description: Morgan Stanley's price target implies that shares of Johnson & Johnson could rise another 17%.
